title: Patricia's Secret
description: Patricia has lived a lonely existence with her aunts, who are very, very careful with her. Then her father comes home from serving in the Air Force overseas, and takes her off to live with him on a military base in far-off California. She anticipates living in a tent and hating every minute of it. She comforts herself with a secret that will make her much happier, but life has a way of sneaking up behind you and surprising you with its own secrets!
author: Ruth Daggett Leinhauser
